name: Wilsons Adventure
description: SAVE YOUR JANE!! Crashed on an island, Wilsons co-pilot Jane has been taken by the magical tribal leader. Battle your way through the fantastical creatures set against you: Avoid being trampled by Mega Pig, burnt alive by Lava Monster, Gobbled up by Sneaky Croc, or sent Bananas by silver back Gorilla. Use your skills traveling through water falls, beaches, caves and monkey attacks, facing many challenges and dodging obstacles. Fantastically fun and challenging for any age, SAVE YOUR JANE!
